'Microsoft Introduces Windows 10 Update With Creative Focus
26 October 2016 , by Dina Bass and Jing Cao (Bloomberg)
http://www.bloomberg.com/news/articles/2016-10-26/microsoft-introduces-windows-10-update-with-creative-focus
- New software version set for spring features virtual reality
- Surface all-in-one computer unveiled in time for holidays'
